ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Eight: Under Siege
ComicInfo.Summary:
This is it! The issue you’ve been waiting for! War has been declared, and the Infinite Seven are UNDER SIEGE!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover A | Arturo Mesa | 1 | B | Movie Variant Cover B, Limited to 1500 | Arturo Mesa | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Michael Calero | 3 | Note: The digital edition (10/25/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 15:58:40. [CVDB632513]
ComicInfo.Editor: Megan Dobransky, Scott Bradley, Shawn Gabborin
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Cinco, Anthony Zane, Butterface, Cyborg, Lars Wolfsberg, Laughing Skull, Lord Ellington, Master Zhen, Sherlock Moriarty, Statutorous Rex, Trigger Mortis, Washington
